title: JSON Schema for NMR restraints report v2
description: The NMR restraints report provides restraint statistics and diagnostic information for NMR restraints with reference to associated atomic coordinates.

original_file_name.description: Original file name of input source.

content_type.description: Content type of input source file.

content_subtype.description: Dictionary of content subtype that accommodates total number of relevant saveframes.

coordinate.description: The number of saveframes associated with atomic coordinates.

non_poly.description: The number of saveframes associated with non-polymer chemical components.

entry_info.description: The number of saveframes associated with entry information.

poly_seq.description: The number of saveframes associated with polymer sequence of entity.

entity.description: The number of saveframes associated with molecular entity.

chem_shift.description: The number of saveframes associated with assigned chemical shifts.

chem_shift_ref.description: The number of saveframes associated with chemical shift reference.

dist_restraint.description: The number of saveframes associated with distance restraints.

dihed_restraint.description: The number of saveframes associated with dihedral angle restraints.

rdc_restraint.description: The number of saveframes associated with residual dipolar coupling (RDC) restraints.

plane_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with planarity restraints.

adist_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with anti-distance restraints.

jcoup_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with scalar J-coupling restraints.

hvycs_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with carbon chemical shift restraints.

procs_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with proton chemical shift restraints.

rama_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with dihedral angle database restraints.

radi_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with radius of gyration restraints.

diff_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with diffusion anisotropy restraints.

nbase_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with nucleic acid base orientation database restraints.

csa_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with (pseudo) chemical shift anisotropy (CSA) restraints.

ang_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with angle database restraints.

pre_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with paramagnetic relaxation enhancement (PRE) restraints.

pcs_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with paramagnetic pseudocontact shift (PCS) restraints.

prdc_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with paramagnetic residual dipolar coupling (RDC) restraints.

pang_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with paramagnetic orientation restraints.

pccr_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with paramagnetic cross-correlation rate (CCR) restraints.

hbond_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with hydrogen bond geometry restraints.

geo_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with coordinate geometry restraints.

noepk_restraint.description: The number of lists associated with NOESY peak volume restraints.

spectral_peak.description: The number of saveframes associated with NEF compatible spectral peak list.

spectral_peak_alt.description: The number of saveframes associated with NMR-STAR cannonical spectral peak list.

topology.description: The number of lists associated with topology information of the studied molecule.

polymer_sequence.description: The array provides the representative sequences of input source file.

polymer_sequence_in_loop.description: The object provides sequences in data loops of specified subtype of content.

chem_shift.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for assigned chemical shifts.

dist_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for distance restraints.

dihed_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for dihedral angle restraints.

rdc_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for RDC restraints.

plane_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for planarity restraints.

adist_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for anti-distance restraints.

jcoup_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for scalar J-coupling restraints.

hvycs_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for carbon/nitrogen chemical shift restraints.

procs_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for proton chemical shift restraints.

rama_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for dihedral angle database restraints.

radi_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for radius of gyration restraints.

diff_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for diffusion anisotropy restraints.

nbase_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for nucleic acid base orientation database restraints.

csa_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for (pseudo) CSA restraints.

ang_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for angle database restraints.

pre_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for PRE restraints.

pcs_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for PCS restraints.

prdc_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for paramagnetic RDC restraints.

pang_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for paramagnetic orientation restraints.

pccr_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for paramagnetic CCR restraints.

hbond_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for hydrogen bond geometry restraints.

geo_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for coordinate geometry restraints.

noepk_restraint.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for NOESY peak volume restraints.

spectral_peak.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for spectral peak lists, stored in NEF compatible categories for spectral peak lists.

spectral_peak_alt.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for spectral peak lists, stored in NMR-STAR canonical categories for spectral peak lists.

coordinate.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for the coordinates.

non_poly.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for non polymer components.

non_standard_residue.description: The array provides list of non-standard residue and appearances in each data loops.

disulfide_bond.description: The array provides list of disulfide bond information.

other_bond.description: The array provides list of other bond information, except for covalent, hydrogen, disulfide bond.

stats_of_exptl_data.description: The object provides statistics of experimental data.

rmsd.description: Template for RMSD of model in ensemble.

well_defined_region.description: Template for well-defined regions in ensemble.

seq_id.description: List of sequence IDs involved in a well-defined region.

polymer_sequence.description: Template for polymer sequence of a chain.

seq_id.description: List of unique sequence ID of a chain.

ins_code.description: List of insertion code of a chain (PDBx/mmCIF specific, aka. atom_site.pdbx_PDB_ins_code).

auth_seq_id.description: List of author sequence ID of a chain when the insertion code exists (PDBx/mmCIF specific, aka. atom_site.auth_seq_id).

label_seq_id.description: List of normalized sequence ID of a chain when the insertion code exists (PDBx/mmCIF specific, aka. atom_site.label_seq_id).

comp_id.description: List of chemical component ID of a chain.

struct_conf.description: List of secondary structure of a chain.

identical_chain_id.description: List of chain IDs having the same sequence.

identical_auth_chain_id.description: List of auth chain IDs having the same sequence.

type.description: Type of polymer sequence. For example, polypeptide(L).

ca_rmsd.description: Information about superimposing of coordinate models.

p_rmsd.description: Information about superimposing of coordinate models.

well_defined_region.description: Information about identified well-defined region in ensemble.

polymer_sequence_in_loop.description: Template for polymer sequences in a loop.

list_id.description: Ordinal number of a data loop.

sf_framecode.description: Saveframe code of a data loop.

polymer_sequence.description: The array provides the polymer sequences in data loops for specified subtype of content.

non_standard_residue.description: Template for non-standard residue of a chain.

chain_id.description: Selected chain ID that contains non-standard residue(s).

seq_id.description: List of sequence ID of non-standard residue(s).

comp_id.description: List of chemical component ID of non-standard residue(s).

chem_comp_name.description: List of chemical component name of non-standard residue(s).

exptl_data.description: List of experimental data that refer non-standard residue(s).

items.description: Dictionary of content subtype that accommodates whether to refer non-standard residue(s).

ss_bond_information.description: Extended template for disulfide bond information.

ca_chem_shift_1.description: CA chemical shift value of the 1st Cystein residue.

cb_chem_shift_1.description: CB chemical shift value of the 1st Cystein residue.

ca_chem_shift_2.description: CA chemical shift value of the 2nd Cystein residue.

cb_chem_shift_2.description: CB chemical shift value of the 2nd Cystein residue.

redox_state_pred_1.description: Redox state prediction of the 1st Cystein residue from given chemical shifts.

redox_state_pred_2.description: Redox state prediction of the 2nd Cystein residue from given chemical shifts.

stats_of_exptl_data.description: Template for statistics of experimental data.

info_of_exptl_data.description: Template for base information of eperimental data.

list_id.description: Ordinal number of a data loop.

sf_framecode.description: Saveframe code of a data loop.

number_of_rows.description: Number of rows in a data loop.

error_descriptions.description: List of error messages arises from a data loop.

warning_descriptions.description: List of warning messages arises from a data loop.

status.description: Status code of a data loop.

sequence_coverage.description: Template for sequence coverage of a chain.

stats_of_covalent_bond.description: Template for statistics of covalent bond constraints.

number_of_constraints.description: Dictionary of constraint type that accommodates total number of constraints.

dist_constraints_per_residue.description: Template for number of distance restraints per residue for given a chain ID.

seq_id.description: List of sequence ID of a chain.

comp_id.description: List of chemical component ID of a chain.

struct_conf.description: List of secondary structure of a chain.

^long_range_hydrogen_bonds.*$.description: Plot of long-range hydrogen bond constraints.

^long_range_disulfide_bonds.*$.description: Plot of long-range disulfide bond constraints.

^long_range_diselenide_bonds.*$.description: Plot of long-range diselenide bond constraints.

^long_range_other_bonds.*$.description: Plot of long-range other bond constraints.

^inter-chain_hydrogen_bonds.*$.description: Plot of inter-chain hydrogen bond constraints.

^inter-chain_disulfide_bonds.*$.description: Plot of inter-chain disulfide bond constraints.

^inter-chain_diselenide_bonds.*$.description: Plot of inter-chain diselenide bond constraints.

^inter-chain_other_bonds.*$.description: Plot of inter-chain other bond constraints.

constraints_on_contact_map.description: Template for constraints on contact map for given a chain ID.

seq_id.description: List of sequence ID of a chain.

comp_id.description: List of chemical component ID of a chain.

struct_conf.description: List of secondary structure of a chain.

^long_range_hydrogen_bonds.*$.description: Plot of long-range hydrogen bond constraints.

^long_range_disulfide_bonds.*$.description: Plot of long-range disulfide bond constraints.

^long_range_diselenide_bonds.*$.description: Plot of long-range diselenide bond constraints.

^long_range_other_bonds.*$.description: Plot of long-range other bond constraints.

constraints_on_asym_contact_map.description: Template for constraints on contact map for given two chain IDs.

seq_id_1.description: List of sequence ID of chain ID 1.

seq_id_2.description: List of sequence ID of chain ID 2.

comp_id_1.description: List of chemical component ID of chain ID 1.

comp_id_2.description: List of chemical component ID of chain ID 2.

struct_conf_1.description: List of secondary structure of chain ID 1.

struct_conf_2.description: List of secondary structure of chain ID 2.

^inter-chain_hydrogen_bonds.*$.description: Plot of inter-chain hydrogen bond constraints.

^inter-chain_disulfide_bonds.*$.description: Plot of inter-chain disulfide bond constraints.

^inter-chain_diselenide_bonds.*$.description: Plot of inter-chain diselenide bond constraints.

^inter-chain_other_bonds.*$.description: Plot of inter-chain other bond constraints.

stats_of_chem_shift.description: Template for statistics of assigned chemical shifts.

number_of_assignments.descrition: Number of assigned chemical shifts for each isotope.

histogram.description: Template for histogram of assigned chemical shifts.

cys_redox_state.description: Template for CYS redox state prediction and validation with the coordinates.

ca_chem_shift.description: Chemical shift value of the CYS CA atom.

cb_chem_shift.description: Chemical shift value of the CYS CB atom.

redox_state_pred.description: Redox state prediction from the chemical shift values.

in_disulfide_bond.description: Whether thiol group of the CYS is involved in disulfide boud.

in_other_bond.description: Whether thiol group of the CYS is involved in other boud.

pro_cis_trans.description: Template for PRO cis/trans state prediction and validation with the coordinates.

cb_chem_shift.description: Chemical shift value of the PRO CB atom.

cg_chem_shift.description: Chemical shift value of the PRO CG atom.

cis_trans_pred.description: Cis/Trans state prediction from the chemical shift values.

in_cis_peptide_bond.description: Whether the PRO is in Cis form.

his_tautomeric_state.description: Template for HIS tautomeric state prediction and validation with the coordinates.

cg_chem_shift.description: Chemical shift value of the HIS CG atom.

cd2_chem_shift.description: Chemical shift value of the HIS CD2 atom.

nd1_chem_shift.description: Chemical shift value of the HIS ND1 atom.

ne2_chem_shift.description: Chemical shift value of the HIS NE2 atom.

tautomeric_state_pred.description: Tautomer state prediction from the chemical shift values.

cg1_chem_shift.description: Chemical shift value of the VAL CG1 atom.

cg2_chem_shift.description: Chemical shift value of the VAL CG2 atom.

cd1_chem_shift.description: Chemical shift value of the LEU/ILE CD1 atom.

cd2_chem_shift.description: Chemical shift value of the LEU CD2 atom.

rotameric_state_pred.description: Rotameric state prediction from the chemical shift values.

name.description: Name of dihedral angle of a residue.

gauche-.description: Population of gauche(-) rotermeric state in ensemble.

trans.description: Population of trans rotermeric state in ensemble.

gauche+.description: Population of gauche(+) rotermeric state in ensemble.

unknown.description: Population of unknown rotermeric state in ensemble.

seq_id.description: List of unique sequence ID of a chain.

comp_id.description: List of chemical component ID of a chain.

struct_conf.description: List of secondary structure of a chain.

completeness_of_chem_shift.description: Template for completeness of assigned chemical shifts of a chain.

completeness_of_all_assignments.description: Completeness of assigned chemical shifts for all atoms.

completeness_of_backbone_assignments.description: Completeness of assigned chemical shifts for all backbone atoms.

completeness_of_sidechain_assignments.description: Completeness of assigned chemical shifts for all sidechain atoms.

completeness_of_methyl_assignments.description: Completeness of assigned chemical shifts for all methyl groups.

completeness_of_aromatic_assignments.description: Completeness of assigned chemical shifts for all aromatic groups.

excluded_comp_id_in_statistics.description: List of excluded chemical component IDs from calculation of completeness of assigned chemical shifts.

excluded_atom_id_in_statistics.description: List of excluded atom IDs from calculation of completeness of assigned chemical shifts.

completeness_of_chem_shift_per_atom_grou.description: Template for completeness of assigned chemical shifts of a atom group.

excluded_comp_id.description: Template for excluded chemical component ID from calculation of completeness of assigned chemical shifts.

excluded_atom_id.description: Template for excluded atom ID from calculation of completeness of assigned chemical shifts.

value.description: Chemical shift value of a atom.

chem_shift_annotation.description: Template for annotation of assigned chemical shifts.

comp_id.description: Chemical component ID of a chain.

value.description: Chemical shift value of a atom.

z_score.description: Z score of chemical shift value.

common_stats_of_restraint.description: Template for common statistics of restraints.

number_of_constraint_sets.description: Number of set of restraints distinguished by restraint ID.

number_of_constraints.description: Number of restraints distinguished by index ID.

number_of_combined_constraints.description: Number of combination of restraints distinguished by combination ID.

items.description: The first item corresponds to the weight value of constraints, the second item represents the occurrence of the weight value.
The first item corresponds to the potential type of constraints, the second item represents the occurrence of the potential type.

stats_of_chem_shift_ref.description: Template for statistics of chemical shift reference (NMR-STAR specific).

chem_shift_ref_loop.description: Template for loop of chemical shift reference (NMR-STAR specific).

stats_of_dist_restraint.description: Template for statistics of distance restraints.

constraints_per_residue.description: Template for plot of number of distance restraints per residue.

histogram.description: Template for histogram of distance restraints.

histogram_of_discrepancy.description: Template for histogram of distance restraints having descrepancy.

dist_restraint_annotation.description: Template for annotation of distance restraints.

comp_id_1.description: Chemical component ID 1 of a chain.

comp_id_2.description: Chemical component ID 2 of a chain.

discrepancy.description: Relative discrepancy of the two distance restraints.

stats_of_dihed_restraint.description: Template for statistics of dihedral angle restraints.

constraints_per_polymer.description: Template for plot of number of constraints per polymer type.

constraints_per_residue.description: Template for plot of number of dihedral angle restraints per residue.

phi_psi_plot.description: Template for PHI-PSI plot data per residue type

chi1_chi2_plot.description: Template for CHI1-CHI2 plot data per residue type

histogram_of_discrepancy.description: Template for histogram of dihedral angle restraints having descrepancy.

dihed_constraints_per_residue.description: Template for number of dihedral angle restraints per residue for given a chain ID.

seq_id.description: List of sequence ID of a chain.

comp_id.description: List of chemical component ID of a chain.

struct_conf.description: List of secondary structure of a chain.

dihed_plot_values.description: Template for plot data per residue type.

items.description: The first/second items correspond to each dihedral angle, the last item represents the position of concerned residue.

dihed_plot_errors.description: Template for plot error per residue type.

items.description: The first/second items correspond to each dihedral angle, the rest items corespond to error bar for each dihedral angle.

dihed_restraint_annotation.description: Template for annotation of dihedral angle restraints.

comp_id.description: Chemical component ID of a chain.

discrepancy.description: Relative discrepancy of the two dihedral angle restraints.

stats_of_rdc_restraint.description: Template for statistics of RDC restraints.

constraints_per_residue.description: Template for plot of number of RDC restraints per residue.

histogram.description: Template for histogram of RDC restraints.

histogram_of_discrepancy.description: Template for histogram of RDC restraints having descrepancy.

rdc_constraints_per_residue.description: Template for number of RDC restraints per residue for given a chain ID.

seq_id.description: List of sequence ID of a chain.

comp_id.description: List of chemical component ID of a chain.

struct_conf.description: List of secondary structure of a chain.

rdc_restraint_annotation.description: Template for annotation of RDC restraints.

comp_id.description: Chemical component ID of a chain.

discrepancy.description: Relative discrepancy of the two RDC restraints.

common_stats_of_spectral_peak.description: Template for common statistics of spectral peak lists.

sequence_alignment_in_coord.description: Template for chain information of sequence alignment in the coordinates.

list_id.description: Ordinal number of a data loop.

sequence_alignment_nmr_coord.description: Template for chain information of sequence alignment between NMR data and the coordinates.

sequence_alignment_in_nmr.description: Template for chain information of sequence alignment in NMR data.

list_id.description: Ordinal number of a data loop.

sf_framecode.description: Saveframe code of a data loop.

chain_assignment.description: Template for chain assignemnt between NMR data and the coordinates.

common_message.description: Template for common structure for error/warning message.

information.description: The object provides information about set of input sources that includes the NMR restraints file and atomic coordinates file.

sequence_alignments.description: The object provides sequence alignments of data loops in the input source file and sequence alignement between different input sources.

model_poly_seq_vs_coordinate.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the NMR data and sequence of the coordinates.

model_poly_seq_vs_nmr_poly_seq.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence of the NMR data.

model_poly_seq_vs_dist_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for distance restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_dihed_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for dihedral angle restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_rdc_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for RDC restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_plane_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for planarity restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_adist_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for anti-distance restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_jcoup_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for scalar J-coupling restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_hvycs_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for carbon/nitrogen chemical shift restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_procs_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for proton chemical shift restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_rama_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for dihedral angle database restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_radi_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for radius of gyration restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_diff_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for diffusion anisotropy restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_nbase_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for nucleic acid base orientation database restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_csa_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for (pseudo) CSA restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_ang_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for angle database restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_pre_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for PRE restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_pcs_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for paramagnetic PCS restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_prdc_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for paramagnetic RDC restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_pang_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for paramagnetic orientation restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_pccr_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for paramagnetic CCR restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_hbond_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for hydrogen bond geometry restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_geo_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for coordinate geometry restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_noepk_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence in data loops for NOESY peak volume restraints.

model_poly_seq_vs_mr_topology.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence of parameter/topology file.

model_poly_seq_vs_mr_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the coordinates and sequence of overall restraint files.

nmr_poly_seq_vs_model_poly_seq.description: The object provides sequence alignment between sequence of the NMR data and sequence of the coordinates.

nmr_poly_seq_vs_chem_shift.description: The object provides sequence alignment between the representative sequence of the NMR data and sequence in data loops for assigned chemical shifts.

nmr_poly_seq_vs_dist_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between the representative sequence of the NMR data and sequence in data loops for distance restraints.

nmr_poly_seq_vs_dihed_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between the representative sequence of the NMR data and sequence in data loops for dihedral angle restraints.

nmr_poly_seq_vs_rdc_restraint.description: The object provides sequence alignment between the representative sequence of the NMR data and sequence in data loops for RDC restraints.

nmr_poly_seq_vs_spectral_peak.description: The object provides sequence alignment between the representative sequence of the NMR data and sequence in data loops for assigned spectral peak lists written in NEF (NMR exchange format) compatible category, for example '_Peak_row_format' for NMR-STAR and '_nef_peak' for NEF.

nmr_poly_seq_vs_spectral_peak_alt.description: The object provides sequence alignment between the representative sequence of the NMR data and sequence in data loops for assigned spectral peak lists written in NMR-STAR cannonical catgories, for example '_Peak', '_Peak_general_char', '_Peak_char', and '_Assigned_peak_chem_shift'.

chain_assignments.description: The object provides chain assignments between the NMR data and the coordinates.

diamagnetic.destriction: Diamagnetism of the molecular assembly, except for Oxygen.

disulfide_bond.description: Whether the molecular assembly has any disulfide bound.

other_bond.description: Whether the molecular assembly has any other bound, except for covalent, hydrogen, disulfide bounds.

cyclic_polymer.description: Whether the molecular assembly has an entity having cyclic linkage, for example cyclic peptide.

status.description: Status code of the input source file.

error.description: The object provides error messages with diagnostic information. If there is a error, wwPDB OneDep file upload failes.

warning.description: The object provides warning messages with diagnostic information. Even with the warning, wwPDB OneDep file upload will succeed.

corrected_warning.description: The object provides warning messages that were initially reported, but were remediated by subsequent diagnostic processes. This is audit history for the remediations.
